# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width = 10)
    lines = ""
    current_line_width = 0

    for word in eachword(text)
        new_line_width = current_line_width + (width(word) + 1)) # Adding space between words

        if new_line_width > text_width
            lines += "\n"
            current_line_width = width(word) + 1 # Resetting to the size of next word
        else
            lines += word
            if current_line_width < new_line_width
                current_line_width = new_line_width
            end
        end
    end

    return lines
end

# Example
text = "This function will wrap words into lines"
wrapped_text = wrap_string(text)
println(wrapped_text)
